n r

| 8 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = 1 -> ( R ^r n ) = ( R ^r 1 ) ) |

| 26 | 25 | #P_sseq2d | |- ( t*rec = ( r e. _V |-> U_ n e. NN0 ( r ^r n ) ) -> ( R C_ ( t*rec ` R ) <-> R C_ ( ( r e. _V |-> U_ n e. NN0 ( r ^r n ) ) ` R ) ) ) |
| 27 | 26 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( t*rec = ( r e. _V |-> U_ n e. NN0 ( r ^r n ) ) -> ( ( ph -> R C_ ( t*rec ` R ) ) <-> ( ph -> R C_ ( ( r e. _V |-> U_ n e. NN0 ( r ^r n ) ) ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 24, 27 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( ph -> R C_ ( t*rec ` R ) ) <-> ( ph -> R C_ ( ( r e. _V |-> U_ n e. NN0 ( r ^r n ) ) ` R ) ) ) |
